text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Avannaata | native_name = Avannaata Kommunia | native_name_lang = kl | type = Municipality | image_skyline = Avannaata-montage.jpg | image_alt = Avannaata municipality | image_caption = Clockwise from top left: Ukkusissat, Upernavik, Ilulissat Icefjord, Qaanaaq, Uummannaq | image_shield = Avannaata-coat-of-arms.jpg | image_map = Avannaata in Greenland 2018.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Location of Avannaata within Greenland | mapsize = 250px | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = Avannaata Commune | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Sovereign state | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Country | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = Municipality | subdivision_name2 = | established_title = Established | established_date = 1 January 2018 | seat_type = Municipal center | seat = Ilulissat | government_footnotes = | leader_party = Siumut | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Palle Jeremiassen | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 522,700 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 10726 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_density_km2 = 0.02 | timezone1 = UTC-03, UTC-04 | area_code_type = Calling code | area_code = +299 | iso_code = | website = avannaata.gl | footnotes = }} Avannaata (, ) is a municipal district of Greenland. The largest settlement there is Ilulissat. ==Related pages== *Pituffik Space Base ==References== Category:Municipalities of Greenland
